title: Floor is Lava’s Movie Magic, Trump’s 2nd Term Vision 6.29.20
itunes:title: Floor is Lava’s Movie Magic, Trump’s 2nd Term Vision 6.29.20
description:
In episode 661, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Marcella Arguello to discuss Trump realizing he is losing, a spike in coronavirus cause of cities opening up, The Nut Job, Floor Is Lava, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Sad! Trump Seems To Realize He’s Losing And It’s No Fun At All
  2. Trump Ignores Virus Spike as U.S. Cases Surge to Record Level
  3. Texas Governor Orders Pause On Reopening As COVID-19 Cases Surge
  4. Cuomo Rips DeSantis On COVID-19 Spike: ‘You Played Politics With This Virus And You Lost’
  5. Packed Bars Serve Up New Rounds Of COVID Contagion
  6. You Can Thank 1950s Suburban Architecture for ‘The Floor Is Lava’
  7. Here's Where 'Floor Is Lava' Players Go After They Fall
  8. How ‘Floor Is Lava’ became Netflix’s weapon in the new arms race of ridiculous game shows
  9. Netflix’s ‘Floor Is Lava’ Is the Stupidest Thing that You Must Watch In Its Entirety Immediately
  10. WATCH: Orion Sun - Antidote

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
